title: Noah's Ark
creator_credit: Bill Justice, Walt Disney and Disney Educational Productions
brief_description: An updated version of the old story of Noah’s Ark, which will trigger children’s interest in biblical stories and initiate classroom discussion. The film is done in an inventive three-dimensional animation technique that will be special interest to film study classes.
